初遇.encontent:
Mission accepted ... Advice, you'd better clear your
 complaint mailbox first.
初遇.content:
你的任务我接下了……一个小建议，你最好先清空自己的
投诉邮箱。

箱中气候.encontent:
You know what? Rain can wash away many things,tire marks, footprints,
 bloodstains, let alone some dying message written in blood ...
 Anyway, I do love rainy days.
箱中气候.content:
你知道吗？雨水会冲掉很多东西。车胎痕、脚印、血迹，还
有某些人沾着血写下的“凶手是……”。总而言之，我喜
欢下雨天。

致未来.encontent:
I really don't get why you guys work so hard.It's a good time,
 full of delicious desserts and clubs. Hey, have some juice,
 little girl,or should I say ... our great heroine and goddess.
致未来.content:
我实在是不明白你们为什么这样努力。这时代不错，有的
是好甜品和俱乐部，来喝点果汁吧，小姑娘。哦～或者说
我们伟大的英雄和女神。

孑立.encontent:
Peter, Andrea, Maleficent, Tonika, Leon ... is everybody
 awake?It's time for something different. ... Don't
 drool everywhere, Andrea!
孑立.content:
皮特、安德烈、玛丽菲森、托尼卡、莱昂……所有人都睡
醒了吗？是时候来玩点不一样的了。……别把口水弄得到
处都是，安德烈！

问候.encontent:
Come in, it's fine, just be careful not be eaten by
 them.
问候.content: 进来也没有关系，但小心别被它们吃掉了。

朝晨.encontent:
You guys always freak me out when you sleep. What kind of people
 need such a long sleep like that? Fall in a coma like a crispy
 critter, and wake up 8 hours later. ... Only god knows how you
 do that.
朝晨.content:
你们总能在睡觉时吓到我，什么人需要那么长的睡眠？你
们倒下去，就像是尸体一样昏迷，直到八个小时后才醒来
。……啧啧，天知道你们是怎么做到的。

信任-朝晨.encontent:
Ok, amico mio, a brand new day, let's go shopping!Why are you
 so confused? You do know how horrible your fridge is, right?
 Its refrigeration is a piece of shit, making my Gelato frozen
 solid!
信任-朝晨.content:
好了，好朋友，又是新的一天，让我们一起出门购物吧！你
为什么会感到困惑呢？你应该知道你们的冰箱有多糟吧？它
不能很好地恒温，只会把我的冰激凌冻得像是砖头一样硬
！

夜暮.encontent: Nice moon, makes me wanna howl.
夜暮.content: 月亮真不错，让我都想要叫出声来了。

信任-夜暮.encontent:
What do you count before sleep? Sheep or wolf? I suggest
 you counting wolves, cause they'll eat up all the
 sheep ... and you can enjoy your night.
信任-夜暮.content:
你睡前数些什么？一群羊还是一群狼？我的建议是狼……因
为它们会吃掉所有羊。然后，你就可以好好享受夜晚了。

帽檐与发鬓.encontent:
Wanna know how many holes I've made on others' head?No?
 Then stop it.
帽檐与发鬓.content:
你想知道我到底在别人脑袋上开了多少个洞吗？不想知道
的话，就别往这儿摸。

袖与手.encontent:
You've noticed? These hands can wring one's neck, pull
 the trigger, slice throat with knife ...  Perfect
 hands.
袖与手.content:
你也注意到了？这双手可以扭断脖子，开枪，用小刀割开
喉咙……可真是一双完美的手。

衣着与身形.encontent:
Cool as hell, right? It's called the Piemonte Art ...
 The salesman said so!
衣着与身形.content:
很酷对吧，这可是皮埃蒙特的艺术——那个售货员亲口说
的！

嗜好.encontent:
I always take souvenirs from my prey.Rings, earrings, photos
 and movie tickets in the wallet, huh ... I got a beautiful cabinet
 for my collections, you wanna see?
嗜好.content:
我总喜欢从猎物身上带走点纪念品。戒指、耳环、照片或
者皮夹里的电影票根……嘿，我有一座漂亮的收藏品柜子
，你想现在看看吗？

赞赏.encontent:
I mean, if I were the boss, I would hire people like
 you too.Although sometimes you are freaking stupid,
 you gotta be useful somehow, right?
赞赏.content:
我是说，如果调换身份，我是老板，我也想雇佣你这样的
人。虽然你偶尔还是蠢得吓人，但总是有好用的时候，对
吧？

亲昵.encontent:
You wanna some Gelato? All the doctors say it's unhealthy
 ... but who cares?
亲昵.content: 你也要来点冰淇淋吗？医生都说这不健康……谁在乎呢？

闲谈Ⅰ.encontent:
You do know James Burton, the one who published the reminiscences?He
 made tons of money through that single book. I should ask him
 for some royalties,it's all about me after all.
闲谈Ⅰ.content:
你应该知道詹姆士·波顿吧？出了回忆录的那个詹姆士·波
顿。他用一本书捞了不少钱，我应该找个时候去找他分一
些版税。毕竟那里头可讲的尽是我的故事。

闲谈Ⅱ.encontent:
Mio padre was missing, mia madre is in the asylum. I can't remember
 her face, but vaguely recall the rhyme she sang me ... She's
 in Rome, probably in her middle age. I've never visited her.
闲谈Ⅱ.content:
我的父亲不知所踪，我的母亲住在精神病院。我不记得她
的脸，但我隐约记得她唱给我的儿歌。……她在罗马，现
在大概已经是个中年人，我从没进去看过她。

独白.encontent:
Go back to Rome, where the wolves were born. Said my former boss.He
 knew I was born in Rome, but didn't know I was raised in Piemonte.He
 was such a fool, even tried to kill me. So I only kept his tie
 clip.I didn't tell him that as long as the night will come,
 everywhere I live is Piemonte.
独白.content:
前雇主对我说，回到罗马去，回到狼出生的地方去。他知
道我在罗马出生，却不知道我在皮埃蒙特长大。他愚蠢得
吓人，甚至想对我动手，所以我留下了他的领带夹。我没
能告诉他，只要还有夜晚，我在哪儿都像是活在皮埃蒙特
。

入队.encontent: Huh ... lemme see who will be my poor teammates.
入队.content: 喔喔，谁会是我那不幸的队友呢？

择选至终的仪式.encontent: I'll give you the time to pray ... as if possible.
择选至终的仪式.content: 我留给你时间祈祷……当然是骗人的。

战斗胜利.content: 万岁！为我们伟大的主人！

洞悉.encontent:
The whispering between wolves and the moon of each
 night ... You make me understand them better. What
 a greedy but brave decision.
洞悉.content:
狼群的声音、每个夜晚的月亮……你让我更能理解它们，这
是个贪心但勇敢的决定。

洞悉之底.encontent:
Hey, I didn't know you value me so much. What do you
 want from me?
洞悉之底.content: 嘿，我没想到你如此看重我，你想得到点什么？
